sys_soap_message_function.envelope: <SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:m="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" SOAP-ENV:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <SOAP-ENV:Body> <AddCustomHoliday xmlns="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema"> <!-- nillable--> <user xsi:type="xsd:string">String</user> <!-- nillable--> <password xsi:type="xsd:string">String</password> <!-- nillable--> <clientTimestamp xsi:type="xsd:string">String</clientTimestamp> <!-- nillable--> <clientIP xsi:type="xsd:string">String</clientIP> <!-- nillable--> <clientOSUser xsi:type="xsd:string">String</clientOSUser> <!-- nillable--> <company xsi:type="xsd:string">String</company> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">String</name> <!-- nillable--> <holiday xsi:type="xsd:string">String</holiday> <!-- nillable--> <holidayDetails xsi:type="m:SoapHolidayDetail"> <!-- nillable--> <country xsi:type="xsd:string">String</country> <!-- nillable--> <description xsi:type="xsd:string">String</description> </holidayDetails> <!-- nillable--> <holidayFrequency xsi:type="m:SoapHolidayFrequency"> <!-- nillable--> <dayOfMonth xsi:type="m:SoapDayOfMonth"> <!-- nillable--> <day xsi:type="xsd:string">String</day> <!-- nillable--> <month xsi:type="xsd:string">String</month> <setValue xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</setValue> </dayOfMonth> <!-- nillable--> <dayOfWeek xsi:type="m:SoapDayOfWeek"> <!-- nillable--> <condition xsi:type="xsd:string">String</condition> <!-- nillable--> <day xsi:type="xsd:string">String</day> <!-- nillable--> <month xsi:type="xsd:string">String</month> <setValue xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</setValue> </dayOfWeek> <!-- nillable--> <oneTimeOnly xsi:type="m:SoapOneTimeOnly"> <!-- nillable--> <date xsi:type="xsd:string">String</date> <setValue xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</setValue> </oneTimeOnly> </holidayFrequency> </AddCustomHoliday> </SOAP-ENV:Body> </SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
